2. Daniel Gantt

Daniel Gantt
============

Term: 2 Years
-------------

Daniel, a native of Houston, Texas, was adopted by Elizabeth and Hendry Gantt Jr. He was raised in North Houston alongside his older sister, Laurie, and younger brother, Michael. Married to Lanita Gantt, they are parents to Jayde and Norman (Ty), as well as grandparents to Reagan & Allana. Currently, along with his wife, holds ownership of a Safety company based in Kilgore.

Daniel Gantt attended both Â Austin Community College & University of Texas Austin majoring in Political Science and Pre-Law.

* Planning & Zoning Board Member
